summary: A teenager is pressured by his father to become a boxer - but a local girl introduces him to the very different sport of rope-jumping.
cast: Corbin Bleu|Keke Palmer|David Reivers|Shanica Knowles|Laivan Greene|Kylee Russell|Patrick Johnson Jr.|Micah Williams|Jajube Mandiela|Mazin Elsadig|Gene Mack|Rebecca Williams|Michael Colonnese|Haley Van Tienen|Paula Brancati|Andrea Bain|Alessandra Cannito|Serena Lee|Tracy Shreve|Kim Roberts|Elle Downs|Sarah Francis|Sean Mauricette|Briana Andrade-Gomes|Tre Michael Bullen|Daniyah Ysrayl|Marcus Taylor|Briana Felix|Tori Lucas|Kiara Felder|Stacey Hipps|Chelsea Simpson|Shavonne Monfiston|Shannon Stevens|Carly Simpson|Harrison Hapin|Ashtyn B. Smith|Michael Sercerchi
title: ¡Salta!
